title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon's journey deploying Quick Suite across thousands of users (BIZ203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊在数千用户中部署 Quick Suite 的历程 (BIZ203)
abstract: Go behind the scenes of Amazon's internal Quick Suite deployment across multiple organizations and thousands of employees. This session covers the challenges of implementing enterprise AI at scale, including data integration complexities, orchestration layer design, and overcoming organizational silos. Learn from Amazon teams about deployment strategies, change management approaches, security considerations, and lessons learned from rolling out Quick Suite across diverse business units. Discover practical frameworks for enterprise-wide AI adoption and hear real stories of transformation challenges and solutions that any organization can apply.
abstract_cn: 深入了解亚马逊内部 Quick Suite 在多个组织和数千名员工中的部署幕后情况。本次会议涵盖了大规模实施企业 AI 的挑战，包括数据集成复杂性、编排层设计以及克服组织孤岛。了解亚马逊团队关于部署策略、变更管理方法、安全考虑因素，以及在不同业务部门推广 Quick Suite 过程中吸取的经验教训。探索企业级 AI 采用的实用框架，并听取任何组织都可以应用的转型挑战和解决方案的真实案例。

presenter.name: Kevin Carlson
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader - Amazon Quick Suite

presenter.name: Sujit Narapareddy
presenter.title: Head of Analytics & Insights, AWS Global Sales
